blog_posts.content:
# My Journey with AI and Machine Learning

In this article, I'll share my experiences learning about artificial intelligence and machine learning as a Computer Science and Business Systems student. I'll cover my academic explorations, projects, and insights gained along the way.

## Getting Started with AI

My interest in AI began during my second year at SASTRA University when I joined SALVO, our university's AI club...

blog_posts.title: Research Experience at IIT Hyderabad
blog_posts.summary: Insights from my research internship at IIT Hyderabad working with computer vision and YOLOv8.
blog_posts.content:
# Research Experience at IIT Hyderabad

During the summer of 2024, I had the opportunity to intern at IIT Hyderabad, working on a computer vision project focused on AOI Detection and driver attention span analysis. In this post, I'll share what I learned and the skills I developed...

basic_info.name: Abhinav Paidisetti
basic_info.title: Computer Science and Business Systems Student

Currently working as an SDE Intern at Wizcom Technologies and serving as a coordinator at SALVO, SASTRA's AI club.
